actionTemplate.title: Tang Butterfly Lip B (Sharper Peaks)
steps: Blank out the original lip line with concealer for a clean canvas
Draw sharper peaks on the cupid's bow and lift them slightly
Keep the lower-lip center a bit tighter to emphasize contrast
Fill and sharpen edges with concealer for crisp lines

rationaleTemplate: Sharper peaks give a bolder, more dramatic historical look.
Best when you want a strong, statement lip.
